channel.title: EruptionX
channel.description:
I'm currently hosting 24/7 a vanilla mindcrack style minecraft server. We have white list enabled and to join the server you need to get approved.
LINK:[url=http://eruption-x.org]http://eruption-x.org[/url]
The server is good for video making because I guarantee you that if you ever get griefed I will roll back the server to one of the backups that are made every single day. Reply if you're interested in joining. Thank you.
